body_content.explanation: the political activities and speeches that happen before an election and are intended to win votes:
examples: Three weeks before the election the candidates are all out on the hustings.
Several Hollywood stars hit the hustings with the candidate this past weekend.

body_content.explanation: a single event before an election where someone who wants to be elected tries to win people's votes:
examples: On Wednesday he was at a hustings in London.
The candidate will be explaining his policy priorities at hustings around the country.
She will take part in ten hustings.
There are at least 10 official Labour hustings meetings still to go.
